data.title: Variable Speed Drives: AT Ascend Communications International
data.meta_description:
Ascend-Communications- AHU - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Ascend Communications International implemented variable speed drives (VSDs) on eight air handling units (AHUs) at their Dublin facility to improve energy efficiency. 
2. A test of VSDs on one AHU showed average load reduction from 26kW to 9kW, a 65% savings. VSDs were expected to provide similar savings on all eight AHUs.
3. Financial analysis showed the VSD project paid for itself in one year through energy savings of £31,200 per year, £823 in reduced heat gain, and £1,160 in maintenance savings, for a total annual savings of £33,183. The installation cost was £33,400.
